wormbase 0.2.9

Best BLASTP hits

Source: R/ftp-blastp.R
blastp.Rd

Best BLASTP hits

blastp(version = getOption(x = "wormbase.version", default = NULL))

Arguments

version

character(1) or NULL. WormBase version. If NULL (recommended), defaults to current production release version available on the WormBase website. Legacy versions can be specified as a character string (e.g. "WS262").

Value

SplitDataFrameList. Split by wormpep column.

Note

Updated 2019-08-28.

Examples

## WormBase FTP server must be accessible.
tryCatch(
    expr = blastp(),
    error = function(e) e
)
#> Transmitting files from 'ftp.wormbase.org'.
